Reviews.Title: “Bad rap”
Reviews.Author: Bullpucky
Reviews.Content: These reviews are entertaining. This place really is a dump and the people that stay are comparable to the occupy wallstreet squatters. Even the writers of these reviews seem to be riding the caboose on the train of evolution. If you are staying there with your girlfriend she should be deformed or at least 300 pounds to fit in. Otherwise, you will probably get harrassed. If she is hot and/or you are bringing kids, make sure you have your .45 fully loaded, cocked and close. On the upside, if you are a cockroach, you get to stay for free as long as you like.

Reviews.Title: “Not what I expected”
Reviews.Author: PastorSOJ
Reviews.Content: With the impression I got on the net I was disappointed particular as the hotel was not near the Pheonix Convention centre as was made to believe.

Reviews.Title: “Reception made difference”
Reviews.Author: CarlosandGigi
Reviews.Content: When I saw the place I was not impressed! I entered the lobby and was received by "Sheila" with a friendly smile. I requested a room and got #210. It was clean and appropriate for a short stay and, as I was in an "unofficial" business trip, adequate. It was also surprisingly quiet for a place central and very close to a highway! I requested a cooler a/c, a fridge and microwave in my room. For a very small charge (@ $2 /day) I got what I requested immediately! "Randy", a very friendly and efficient security guard fixed the a/c and installed the items. In a "nutshell"< I would not recommend the place for a honey moon, but certainly for a short, very economic stay, ideal for backpackers and travelers in a budget. I am a bit of a snob and prefer 5 star hotels(unfortunately they come with comparable prices!) but I am also very adaptable. "Randy" and "Sheila" made the difference! If the owner would spend a bit on TLC the place could attract a better clientele! Do not expect luxury, remember what you pay and have a good time....

Reviews.Title: “A nice place to get robbed and assaulted”
Reviews.Author: jofshiningbluewaters
Reviews.Content: I stayed here and i must say that this is the most sleazy, lowlife motel i have EVER stayed at. I understand that the budget lodge downtown is not as bad, but this is no hotel. Most of the people there seemed to be living there as this hotel caters to homeless people trying to get off the streets (they have a hundred buck a week rate), prostitutes (presumably this is why you can have no visitors after 9 pm) and drug addicts (there were hypo needles found under the bed and nearly poked me. I had to call 911 when a sleazy looking guy claiming to be hotel staff tried to steal my belongings from my room.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Hell”
Reviews.Author: wintergreen95
Reviews.Content: One of worst experiences in my life. Was staying here because a friend's house was foreclosing and the paperwork on the new house was delayed, so I was in between. What a nightmare. Roaches. Black carpet. Criminal neighbors. Dangerous people. Water smells like sewage when you turn it on. Worst part: the owners and the people on the first shift. I asked the guy why he was being so rude to me, and he started screaming nonsense. I said, "you need to stop screaming at me." He screamed back, "I'M NOT SCREAMING!!!!"

Reviews.Title: “Good stay for those who are, On-the-cheap!”
Reviews.Author: BudgetBoy1973
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for 10 days, paying SE-Asia lodging rates, nice! They do charge you for some amenities, but if you are just looking for somewhere to sleep, it does the trick. They charge for phone & remote, etc. I am young enough to get up & change the channel like a youngster, but do miss the remote. Who needs to demand a phone is included? Everyone has their own mobile phones anyway, so I was happy to save cash on that unnecessary amenity. Maid service is weekly, but I do not need my bed made daily, or I could do it myself if important to me. It worked out to be a nuts & bolts purchasing operation, allowing budget travelers to pay for just a decent place to sleep. The AC worked well, they had hot water & the bed was restful. The power went out for a few hours one evening, but who knows who was to blame for that? I did stay there 10 days, saving loads of money compared to other similar options. I will return again if needed in the future if they keep their good prices! I would, however, stay elsewhere if it was not so affordable though. I would recommend other resorts if seeking romantic lodging, staying with ladies, or children needing supervision. All in all, it was a lucky option to have in our current economy. They did offer free Wi-Fi in lobby during limited hours. That was nice, but I chose to do my Wi-Fi needs in local Denny's instead cause theirs was very limiting & inconvenient, but alas it was without charge. I hope the hotel continues to offer the rates they gave me for the services provided. I may need to use it again while in the surrounding Phoenix area while job-searching, attending required training, etc.

Reviews.Title: “Good value”
Reviews.Author: BlueSkiesToday
Reviews.Content: We stayed here one night to be somewhat near the airport for a flight the following day. It was clean and roomy with cable tv and adequate air conditioning. The bed was clean and comfortable and the room looked freshly painted. The hallways were in the process of being painted. There was no pool, but we did not need one. In the morning, free coffee, juice and apples were provided at the front desk. Good enough for a quick place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Customer service? You have to be joking”
Reviews.Author: sckntwizted
Reviews.Content: I too live locally and my husband and i got annoyed with traffic on the 17 and thought we would stop and a hotel and just have a good Friday night. We were both in very good moods when we walked into the hotel. However that was short lived, - i walk into the building and look to my left and see a room with the lights out and furniture pilled in there like they were soon going out of business or moving. I asked the lady at thr counter, who had already begun to glare at me, with a smile on my face "are we allow to rent here?". You see, there are no lights on the outside of the building, and the inside is a mess so it seemed like a logical question. However this woman snapped at me telling me how stupid of a question that is. I was shocked and appalled.. this pathetic excuse for costumer service will no got unpunished in my book. There are tons of people out there looking for jobs who would gladly take hers and i bet the owner would love to hear how many people are actually going someone where else because of this woman. So here's a number, PLEASE call and let them know. Weather or not you do i will make sure that for the remainder of the time that this woman works there is absolutely miserable because i hope that job goes to someone who can at the very least treat people with respect. BUDGET LODGE- 602-995-9500 And if your reading this.. im sure you remember me.. HUNNY... Please do the world a favor and find a job where you DO NOT DEAL WITH LIVE PEOPLE. You are by far the rudest nastiest woman i have ever come across and it all came so natural to you. Have a great day

Reviews.Title: “Worst customer service in the world!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Zinith
Reviews.Content: This place is a joke and The Budget Lodge should be closed down. I needed a place for my son for a week and the sign says 125.00 for a week but I paid 165.00 plus 35.00 deposit and that didn't include the remote control for the T.V. or phone!!! As we was checking in I was asking questions and the young lady told me that she couldn't answer my questions because everything is written in front of me!! What nerve I am paying and she is working and she getting paid to do job that she did not want to do!! What really pissed me off was that I had placed a $10.00 deposit on the phone and and the next day I called my son and they told me that there was no phone service to that room. As I was asking how is this possible the manager told me I should talk to the person who is wasting my money and hung up the phone on me!!! Customer service 101 never make a customer mad!!! I called back to ask for corporation number but I was informed that this place is privately owned and was hung up on again. What I wanted to know the first time when I call was there any way to add another deposit on the phone and did it incoming phone calls count if no one answers the phone. Since out going phone calls are .25 and incoming calls are .10 !!!! As for the room it looked clean until you look at the carpet which really needs to be replaced!! For the price they charge this room should be at least 3 star hotel which it isn't. Do not waste you money on this Motel!!! Why stay some where when the employees are making you feel like they are doing you a favor instead making you feel welcome and they glad you pick their motel. As for the owner you should review your tacts & policies on your rooms as well hiring personal. Yours signs are misleading and could be consider false advertisment!! Your manager is rude and really needs some customers services skills. Like the old saying go (Your team is only as great as your leader is!!!) This happened on 3/13/09 about 1:00p.m. but on the same day your night desk clerk & security where nice.

Reviews.Title: “Filthiest Place I've stayed at!”
Reviews.Author: latidotty
Reviews.Content: Overall I'm completely stunned that a place like this is allowed to do any business. Filthy is putting it lightly. My boyfriend and I live locally, but we decided to get away from the house for a night. We stopped at this hotel because the sign said $35. It was $44. Then if we wanted a remote it was $1.25. Plus $5.00 key deposit. I felt like we were being interrogated during the check in process. The lady made me come in with ID so she could get a copy of it also. My instincts told me to take our credit card and leave, but we tried to remain positive. When we got to our room it was cold, so we tried the heater and it blew out cold air. The carpets were discustingly dirty and burn holes all over it. The sheets looked clean, but I wonder if they were. I've stayed at cheaper hotels in Phoenix area and they put this place to shame. AND then, when we brought our key to check out the lady was at first nice to us, and as I was leaving I turned around and asked the lady for my $5.00 key deposit back. She gets this sour look on her face and tells me to hold on while she makes a phone call and has the maid inspect the room. UNBELIEVABLE!! The lady tells me that the sheet has a burn hole in it and I told her I didn't believe it. So she calls the maid, supposedly, and tells her to bring the sheet up. Well I waited and waited and finally I just threw ten dollars at her and told her I wouldn't be back to this place ever. I'm just completely stunned at the audascity of these people.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible place to stay”
Reviews.Author: azlegend
Reviews.Content: This place is more like a flop house than a motel. Their list of rules is more than a page long. Here is one of my favorites, If you swim after pool closing time you will be asked to LEAVE with no money refunded. They charge extra for the TV Remote Control. The draperies had holes in them and anyone who wanted to could see right through them. The air conditioning was literally falling apart and was unable to properly cool the room. The bed was ancient I have had better beds at $25.00 per night hotels. They have ice but they charge extra for that also. They charge extra if you check out early. They charge extra for visitors. The sign out front says from $34.00, or $44.00 but I paid $51.00 for a single. There are way better hotels and motels in the immediate area for the same price.

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: easytosatisfy
Reviews.Content: Afetr reading reveiws from TripAdvisor I wanted to see how bad this place really was. The place is OLD so I did not expect a 4 star resort. The clerk was feindly and I was impressed with the check in process; I was asked questions that I never get asked at other hotels so based on what I answered is what room I was given. The room was obviously in need of some repair but the bed was comfortable and the bath was clean so I didn't need any more than that. and as it was explained to me at check in- the rate was so low because all charges are "a la carte". So if I had wanted to pay $60 dollars a night and have everthing included I would have stayed at a Resort. Ther are too many people in this world trying to get all that they can for nothing. That's why rates are so outlandish most of the time.

Reviews.Title: “Worst motel I've ever stayed at.”
Reviews.Author: when2rinluv
Reviews.Content: Manager and majority of other staff have no customer service skills. Do not stay here if you can help it. Better to pay the extra money for a better room and more pleasant stay. They nickel and dime you anyway because you have to pay for anything in addition ie., phone(incoming/outgoing), ice,.. Most of the rooms are either occupied by drug users or their dealers. The only positive thing I can say about this place is that they have security present on most nights and they certainly need it.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible”
Reviews.Author: lauren033
Reviews.Content: Cable did't work, when I asked to get it fixed the gentelmen were rude and had horrible customer service, but said they would call the maitance man so I went back to my room. After waiting an hour I ventured back down to the gentelmen that had been so rude before to ask where the maintiance man was (keep in mind it is 11:30pm). There responce was, "we can't control him, he will get there when he does". I asked them for a refund or compensation for how horrible my expierence has been. They just kept their same attitudes and were rude saying they couldn't do anything and they don't give refunds. Overall the customer service was horrible I don't see how bussiness stay open with cutomer service as horrible as that. Espically when the rooms are as gross as mine was with stains all over the carpet and the bed linens and chairs where all you see is black marks. EW. I hope no one else throws away 55 dollars on this motel!!! lauren.
